original_text: I desired Titus, and with him I sent a brother. Did Titus make a gain of you? walked we not in the same spirit? walked we not in the same steps?
korean_text: 내가 디도를 권하고 함께 한 형제를 보내었으니 디도가 너희의 이득을 취하더냐 우리가 동일한 성령으로 행하지 아니하더냐 동일한 보조로 하지 아니하더냐

sentences.original_text: and with him I sent a brother
Did Titus make a gain of you?
walked we not in the same spirit?
walked we not in the same steps?
